SELECT NOTICE_NO, FIELD, CATEGORY_NAME, NOTICE_TITLE, ORIGIN_NAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" FROM NOTICE N LEFT JOIN NOTICE_ATTACHMENT NA USING(NOTICE_NO) JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON(CATEGORY_NO = NOTICE_CATEGORY) WHERE N.STATUS='Y' AND FIELD = 0 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_CATEGORY, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT DESC) "RANK" FROM NOTICE WHERE FIELD = 1 AND STATUS='Y' AND NOTICE_CATEGORY = 1 AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
